name: Minecraft Admin Suite
short_description:
This software is designed to make deploying Minecraft servers quick and easy. It will allow for remote management and control of the server, monitor multiple servers and players on each server, and it will also include status and map features like those of amidst.

This suite is designed to include many of the features already available on my previous project "Craft-Control" which is only a windows widget. This suite will allow for all of the craft-control features to be available for mac and Linux users as well.
summary: A Cross Platform Software Suite For Minecraft Admins and Hobbyists
